description:
Kouichi Uehara is a fourth grade student living in the suburb of Tokyo. One day, he picks up a large stone which turns out to be a fossil of a baby "Kappa" sleeping underground for the past 300 years, and names it "Coo". Koichi and Coo become good friends and starts living with his family. However, Coo could not adjust to the life style in Tokyo and starts to miss his family. On a hot summer day, Koichi and Coo decide to go on an adventurous road trip to find his peers.

(Source: AniDB)

tags.name: Youkai
tags.description: Prominently features supernatural creatures from Japanese folklore.

tags.name: Environmental
tags.description: Concern with the state of the natural world and how humans interact with it.

tags.name: Coming of Age
tags.description: Centers around a character's transition from childhood to adulthood.

tags.name: Bullying
tags.description: Prominently features the use of force for intimidation, often in a school setting.

tags.name: Rural
tags.description: Partly or completely set in the countryside.

tags.name: Family Life
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a family unit.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Historical
tags.description: Partly or completely set during a real period of world history.

tags.name: Natural Disaster
tags.description: It focuses on catastrophic events of natural origin, such as earthquakes, tsunamis,  volcanic eruptions, and severe storms. These works often present situations of extreme danger in which the characters struggle to survive and overcome the adversity.

node.description: Yuuji Saitou is a music producer.
Wakakusa Kei is a composer and arranger.  His real name is Saitou Tooru (斉藤 徹).

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/増田敏彦)

Affiliated with [Telecom Animation Film](https://anilist.co/studio/94/).

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/原恵一)

An award winning freelance director.

Originating from M.S.C.

_Note: Not to be confused with either the CG artist or the sound producer._

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/magicmagico) He joined Okayasu Promotion after graduating and studied there as editor, he collected experience on tv animation and drama and gave his debut on Ninja Hattori. He is currently working for 1000 Yamakoshi. Not to be confused with the other Toshihiko Kojima whose name is written with different Kanji.

Originating from [Production I.G](https://anilist.co/studio/10/). Close friends with [Masahiro Andou](https://anilist.co/staff/101518/).

_Note: Not to be confused with the [other animator](https://anilist.co/staff/222513/) or the [art director](https://anilist.co/staff/219445/)._

After graduating from Yoyogi Animation Gakuin, he joined [Telecom Animation Film](https://anilist.co/studio/94/). Currently he mainly works with [Wit Studio](https://anilist.co/studio/858/), but has previously worked for studios such as [Telecom](https://anilist.co/studio/94/), [Shin-Ei](https://anilist.co/studio/247/) and [Production I.G](https://anilist.co/studio/10/).

Made his debut as a director with [Hal](https://anilist.co/anime/16528/) in 2013.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/原恵一)

An award winning freelance director.
